RailsConf 2006

Dec 5, 2005

Just when I'd set the date to visit my friend in NYC (postponed thrice!) in Apr.. comes the announcement of RailsConf in end June '06. I would really prefer visiting US of A at a cooler climate.

"24 degree celsius. That's Singapore's weather on a good day", Love quipped


And, flying from New York to Chicago would raise my total expenditure by at least SGD $1200.. I'm not exactly feeling too rich at the moment.

From the rate Rails is growing... this is too big to miss...

I wonder if paypal donations can get me there. Hmm.




Will be back online nxt week. BBL.
